title: Sociological Theory - Smithing Queer Empiricism: Engaging Ethnomethodology for a Queer Social Science
itunes:title: Sociological Theory - Smithing Queer Empiricism: Engaging Ethnomethodology for a Queer Social Science
description: Author S. L. Crawley discusses their article, "Smithing Queer Empiricism: Engaging Ethnomethodology for a Queer Social Science," published in the September 2021 issue of Sociological Theory.
